entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Light snow ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023
